name: Duality (itch) (Insanitori)
description:
You are a lost spirit! You must attempt to escape the dark forest or it will kill you and you will be forced to become one with nature.

This game needs two players. 

WASD to move the character. Space to jump.

Press 4 for player 2 to shoot and Arrow keys to move where to shoot.

(Instead of I use 1 on the main screen for how to play)

Art assets done by Katlyn Athanas https://katathanas.itch.io
